TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlCommandBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class SqlCommandBuilder Inherits DbCommandBuilder
public ref class SqlCommandBuilder sealed : System::Data::Common::DbCommandBuilder

summary.span: 自動產生單一資料表命令，用於調節對具有關聯 SQL Server 資料庫之 的變更。

span.span: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a with the associated SQL Server database.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 調解所做的變更所需的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式不會自動產生與相關聯的 SQL Server 執行個體。The does not automatically generate the Transact-SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a with the associated instance of SQL Server. 不過，您可以建立物件來自動產生單一資料表更新的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式，如果您設定屬性。However, you can create a object to automatically generate Transact-SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the property of the . 然後，您未設定任何其他 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式由產生。Then, any additional Transact-SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the . 自己註冊為接聽程式事件，每當您設定屬性。The registers itself as a listener for events whenever you set the property. 您只能將一個或彼此物件一次。You can only associate one or object with each other at one time. 若要產生 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式使用屬性，以自動擷取一組必要中繼資料。To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the uses the property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically. 如果您變更中繼資料擷取，例如第一個更新之後，您應該呼叫之後方法來更新中繼資料。If you change the after the metadata has been retrieved, such as after the first update, you should call the method to update the metadata. `SelectCommand` 還必須傳回至少一個主索引鍵或唯一的資料行。The `SelectCommand` must also return at least one primary key or unique column. 如果都不存在， **InvalidOperation**會產生例外狀況，並不會產生命令。If none are present, an **InvalidOperation** exception is generated, and the commands are not generated. 也會使用， ，以及屬性所參考。The also uses the , , and properties referenced by the . 使用者應該呼叫修改一或多個屬性，則本身會被取代。The user should call if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the itself is replaced. 否則， ，和屬性會保留其先前的值。Otherwise the , , and properties retain their previous values. 如果您呼叫，則解除關聯，以及無法再使用產生的命令。If you call , the is disassociated from the , and the generated commands are no longer used. ## Examples 下列範例會使用，以及和、 從資料來源選取資料列。The following example uses the , along and , to select rows from a data source. 此範例會傳遞連接字串、 查詢字串，為 TRANSACT-SQL SELECT 陳述式和為資料庫資料表名稱的字串。The example is passed a connection string, a query string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement, and a string that is the name of the database table. 這個範例會建立。The example then creates a . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommandBuilder/CS/Source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommandBuilder/VB/Source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the associated object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自己註冊為接聽程式產生的事件這個屬性中指定。The registers itself as a listener for events that are generated by the specified in this property. 當您建立的新執行個體，任何現有與此相關聯發行。When you create a new instance of , any existing associated with this is released.

A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自己註冊為接聽程式產生的事件這個屬性中指定。The registers itself as a listener for events that are generated by the specified in this property. 當您建立的新執行個體，任何現有與此相關聯發行。When you create a new instance of , any existing associated with this is released.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void DeriveParameters(class System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand command) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DeriveParameters (command As SqlCommand)

param.name: command
param.span: ，參考參數資訊衍生來源的預存程序。

span.span: The referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.

param.span: 衍生的參數已加入到 的 集合。

span.span: The derived parameters are added to the collection of the .

summary.span: 從 中指定的預存程序 (Stored Procedure) 擷取參數資訊，並填入 (Populate) 指定 物件的 集合。

span.span: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the and populates the collection of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DeriveParameters` 會覆寫任何現有參數資訊`SqlDbCommand`。`DeriveParameters` overwrites any existing parameter information for the `SqlDbCommand`. `DeriveParameters` 需要額外的呼叫資料庫取得資訊。`DeriveParameters` requires an additional call to the database to obtain the information. 如果事先已知參數資訊，它會更有效率的方式藉由明確設定的資訊填入參數集合。If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly. 您只能使用`DeriveParameters`預存程序。You can only use `DeriveParameters` with stored procedures. 您無法使用`DeriveParameters`擴充預存程序。You cannot use `DeriveParameters` with extended stored procedures. 您無法使用`DeriveParameters`填入使用任意的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式，例如參數化的 SELECT 陳述式。You cannot use `DeriveParameters` to populate the with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 設定參數和參數資料類型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

exception.span: 命令文字不是有效的預存程序名稱。

span.span: The command text is not a valid stored procedure name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

summary.span: 取得在資料庫上執行刪除時所需之自動產生的 物件。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions on the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫並修改值，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生的 SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確呼叫如果它會變更以任何方式陳述式。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否則，仍會使用從先前的陳述式，因此可能不正確的資訊。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 應用程式會呼叫其中一個時，會先產生 SQL 陳述式或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand GetDeleteCommand() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫並修改值，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生的 SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確呼叫如果它會變更以任何方式陳述式。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否則，仍會使用從先前的陳述式，因此可能不正確的資訊。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 應用程式會呼叫其中一個時，會先產生 SQL 陳述式或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand GetDeleteCommand(bool useColumnsForParameterNames) cil managed
Public Function GetDeleteCommand (useColumnsForParameterNames As Boolean) As SqlCommand

param.name: useColumnsForParameterNames
param.span: 如果為 ，則盡可能產生符合資料行名稱的參數名稱。

span.span: If , generate parameter names matching column names if possible.
If , generate @p1, @p2, and so on.

summary.span: 取得在資料庫上執行刪除時所需之自動產生的 物件。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object that is required to perform deletions on the database.

returns.span: 執行刪除時所需之自動產生的 物件。

span.span: The automatically generated object that is required to perform deletions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫並修改值，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生的 SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確呼叫如果它會變更以任何方式陳述式。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否則，仍會使用從先前的陳述式，因此可能不正確的資訊。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 應用程式會呼叫其中一個時，會先產生 SQL 陳述式或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用@p1， @p2，依此類推的各種不同的參數。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters. 傳遞`true`for`useColumnsForParameterNames`參數可讓您強制執行產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 符合下列條件時，才會如此成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 傳回從**GetSchema**方法呼叫，並在找到在指定集合，且其長度等於或大於產生的參數名稱。The returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 產生的參數名稱符合指定準則傳回從**GetSchema**方法呼叫，並在找到集合的規則運算式。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection regular expression. - A傳回從**GetSchema**方法呼叫，並在找到指定集合。A returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection is specified. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

summary.span: 取得在資料庫上執行更新時所需之自動產生的 物件。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform updates on the database.

returns.span: 執行更新時所需之自動產生的 物件。

span.span: The automatically generated object that is required to perform updates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫並修改值，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確呼叫如果它會變更以任何方式陳述式。After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否則，仍會使用從先前的陳述式，因此可能不正確的資訊。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 應用程式會呼叫其中一個時，會先產生 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或。The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand GetUpdateCommand(bool useColumnsForParameterNames) cil managed
Public Function GetUpdateCommand (useColumnsForParameterNames As Boolean) As SqlCommand

param.name: useColumnsForParameterNames
param.span: 如果為 ，則盡可能產生符合資料行名稱的參數名稱。

span.span: If , generate parameter names matching column names if possible.
If , generate @p1, @p2, and so on.

summary.span: 取得在資料庫上執行更新時所需之自動產生的 物件。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform updates on the database.

returns.span: 自動產生的 物件，執行更新時所需要的。

span.span: The automatically generated object required to perform updates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫並修改值，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確呼叫如果它會變更以任何方式陳述式。After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否則，仍會使用從先前的陳述式，因此可能不正確的資訊。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 應用程式會呼叫其中一個時，會先產生 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或。The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用@p1， @p2，依此類推的各種不同的參數。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters. 傳遞`true`for`useColumnsForParameterNames`參數可讓您強制執行產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 符合下列條件時，才會如此成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 傳回從**GetSchema**方法呼叫，並在找到在指定集合，且其長度等於或大於產生的參數名稱。The returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 產生的參數名稱符合指定準則傳回從**GetSchema**方法呼叫，並在找到集合的規則運算式。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection regular expression. - A傳回從**GetSchema**方法呼叫，並在找到指定集合。A returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection is specified. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

.method public hidebysig virtual instance string QuoteIdentifier(string unquotedIdentifier) cil managed
Public Overrides Function QuoteIdentifier (unquotedIdentifier As String) As String

param.name: unquotedIdentifier
param.span: 原始的不具引號之識別項。

span.span: The original unquoted identifier.

summary.span: 在正確資料庫目錄情況下提供不具引號的識別項時，會傳回該識別項具引號的正確格式。

span.span: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.

summary.span: 這包括正確地逸出識別項中的任何內嵌引號。

span.span: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
The quoted version of the identifier.

returns.span: 識別項內的內嵌引號已正確逸出。

span.span: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string QuotePrefix { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property QuotePrefix As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ QuotePrefix { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.QuotePrefix : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定一或多個開始字元，當指定其名稱包含空格或保留語彙基元 (Token) 之類字元的 SQL Server 資料庫物件 (例如資料表或資料行) 時，就可以使用。

span.span: Gets or sets the starting character or characters to use when specifying SQL Server database objects, such as tables or columns, whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
The starting character or characters to use.
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 雖然您無法變更或是屬性之後插入、 更新或刪除已經產生命令，您可以變更其設定之後呼叫`Update`資料配接器的方法。Although you cannot change the or properties after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated, you can change their settings after calling the `Update` method of a DataAdapter.

exception.span: 這個屬性不能在已經產生 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 命令之後變更。

span.span: This property cannot be changed after an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE command has been generated.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string QuoteSuffix { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property QuoteSuffix As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ QuoteSuffix { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.QuoteSuffix : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定一或多個結束字元，當指定其名稱包含空格或語彙基元之類字元的 SQL Server 資料庫物件 (例如資料表或資料行) 時，就可以使用。

span.span: Gets or sets the ending character or characters to use when specifying SQL Server database objects, such as tables or columns, whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
The ending character or characters to use.
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 雖然您無法變更或是屬性之後插入、 更新或刪除已產生作業，您可以變更其設定之後呼叫`Update`資料配接器的方法。Although you cannot change the or properties after an insert, update, or delete operation has been generated, you can change their settings after calling the `Update` method of a DataAdapter.

exception.span: 在已經產生插入、更新或刪除命令之後，無法變更這個屬性。

span.span: This property cannot be changed after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RefreshSchema() cil managed
public override string SchemaSeparator { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property SchemaSeparator As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SchemaSeparator { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SchemaSeparator : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用於結構描述識別項和任何其他識別項間之分隔符號的字元。

span.span: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.

value.span: 當做結構描述分隔符號使用的字元。

span.span: The character to be used as the schema separator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，資料庫伺服器會表示為識別項的結構描述分隔從具有某些字元之識別項的結構描述名稱。Generally, database servers indicate the schema for a identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character. 例如，SQL Server 使用一段時間，建立完整的識別項，例如 Person.CustomerName，其中 「 Person 」 是結構描述名稱，而"CustomerName"為識別項。For example, SQL Server uses a period, creating complete identifiers such as Person.CustomerName, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier. 設定這個屬性可讓開發人員修改此行為。Setting this property lets developers modify this behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void SetRowUpdatingHandler(class System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter adapter) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub SetRowUpdatingHandler (adapter As DbDataAdapter)
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string UnquoteIdentifier(string quotedIdentifier) cil managed
Public Overrides Function UnquoteIdentifier (quotedIdentifier As String) As String

param.name: quotedIdentifier
param.span: 將移除其內嵌引號的識別項。

span.span: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.

summary.span: 在有提供引號識別項時，會傳回該識別項不具引號的正確格式。

span.span: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier.

summary.span: 這包括正確包含識別項中的任何內嵌引號。

span.span: This includes correctly unescaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.

returns.span: 不具引號的識別項，會適當包含內嵌的引號。

span.span: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly unescaped.
